item.title: DevShelf: Download Distributed Search Engine (Java)
item.description: Download DevShelf — an open-source search engine and digital library for Computer Science books, built in Java with offline indexing and cloud streaming.

item.title: MQNotebook — Enterprise-Grade RAG System
item.description: MQNotebook is a production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine designed for messy, real-world enterprise documents.

item.title: BabyGPT: Generative Text Engine
item.description: A character-level Generative AI model built from scratch using Dual-Stack LSTMs and custom temperature sampling.
